plot: PAPA AFRICA is a portrait of a family, in documentary form. Father and son travel from Germany to the roots of their family in Ghana. The father has not seen his brother for 35 years, the son has never met his relatives - on the road to the roots...   Written by  otu tetteh
title: Papa Africa
